title: Ok so I recently hit Honor 5 and I've got a question.

replies.body: Once an account hits a permanent ban it's likely not getting lifted since usually it goes through several warnings and suspensions. The goal with those is to give time to reflect and reform before a permanent ban is necessary. You're always welcome to reach out to our account team in a ticket to see what's going on with your other account, but regardless of the outcome, I'm still glad to hear you finished the trek to Honor rank 5!
